bonustraits.trait: Gives a 15% bonus on Charisma, and a level in bartering.
Gives a 20% bonus on Cunning, and a level in trap disarming.
Gives a 20% bonus on Speed, and a level in swimming (which is useless for now).
Gives a 20% bonus on Strength, and a level in acrobatics.
Gives a 20% bonus on Charisma, levels in sweet talking and kissing, and half a level in bartering.
Gives a 20% bonus on Carnality and Stimulation, levels in blowjobs, masturbation, and anal play, and half a level in sweet talking.
Starts with bigger body parts. Males start with a 20% penis length bonus. Women start with at least E cups, voluptuous hips, and substantial butts. Both start with at least spongy hips.
Gives triple the cum production, with a high chance of leaving trails for a time afterwards. If female, milk production is always at least a dribble at any time.
